title: The Guardian's Riddle
goal: They encounter an ancient guardian or a complex magical puzzle protecting the Heartstone.

beats.summary: The trio arrives at the Heartstone's hidden location, a place shrouded in ancient magic and forgotten lore, its entrance cunningly concealed.
They face an ancient, sentient guardian, a construct of pure magic, or a series of intricate, mind-bending magical traps designed to deter the unworthy.
Kaelen must draw upon his deepest, most forgotten wisdom to solve the guardian's riddle or bypass the complex magical defenses, a true test of his ancient mind.
Seraphina's unexpected insights into local legends and obscure folklore prove surprisingly useful, offering a different perspective on the ancient challenge.
